biotools.summary: SBMOpenMM is a Python library to facilitate the creation of Structure Based Model simulations using the OpenMM library. It contains several methods that connect the structural information of a protein system with the necessary objects to aid in the creation of an SBM force field compatible with the OpenMM simulation engine.

bioschemas.name: SBMOpenMM
